author: perrotta
body:
Integrate the following tickets in the HLT master table only:
- CMSHLT-132: HLT for low mass higgs
- CMSHLT-137: Add paths for VBF H(inv)
- CMSHLT-147: Update of multilepton paths for HIG

Integrate the following tickets in the HLT master table and GRun (i.e. RelVal's):
- CMSHLT-139: Adding EXO E-Mu Path
- CMSHLT-140: Add high dxy versions of Displaced SUSY paths
- CMSHLT-143: Integration of alphaT paths
- CMSHLT-144: Implement HLT_BTagMu__Jet__Mu5_v1 paths for b-tag POG
- CMSHLT-148: Integration of Trimmed Dijet Path for B2G

Move the already integrated CMSHLT-128 (FastPV update and triggers for ZnnHbb,VBFHbb,X->HH->4b) to GRun

Integrate CMSHLT-149, which updates two DiElectron paths already in the HLT menu
title: Continue integrating HLT for Run2
